body_html:
I agree, this looks like a bug in numpy on PPC, although it is perfectly possible that the numpy maintainers have good reasons for this behavior.

I would not want to deviate from numpy for things like this, but if the test failure is annoying, we can special case that test to omit this check for ppc.
body_text:
I agree, this looks like a bug in numpy on PPC, although it is perfectly possible that the numpy maintainers have good reasons for this behavior.
I would not want to deviate from numpy for things like this, but if the test failure is annoying, we can special case that test to omit this check for ppc.
body:
I agree, this looks like a bug in numpy on PPC, although it is perfectly possible that the numpy maintainers have good reasons for this behavior.

I would not want to deviate from numpy for things like this, but if the test failure is annoying, we can special case that test to omit this check for ppc.
